pull.title: On windows, show message box with help, as there is no stderr (fixes #702)

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message: On windows, show message box with help, as there is no stderr (fixes #702)

events.body: I think it's a bit strange that the windows version would show a message box, while on other operating systems an error is printed to stderr. Very few people run a GUI from a terminal that remains open anyway.

@sipa: I'm simply mimicing the behaviour of most programs... On linux, people expect --help output in the terminal (which can be copied, piped, redirected, etc). On windows they expect a message box (as there is no other way).

I really don't like the message box to be the default.
